body:
**What happened**: Following issue was observed while running the e2e test cases for CSI migration testing. 
•! Panic [50.165 seconds]
[sig-storage] vcp-performance [Feature:vsphere]
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/utils/framework.go:23
  vcp performance tests [It]
  /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/vsphere/vsphere_volume_perf.go:96

  Test Panicked
  assignment to entry in nil map
  /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:55

  Full Stack Trace
  k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime.HandleCrash(0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
  	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:55 +0x105
  panic(0x4b3a0e0, 0x5c329d0)
  	/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:969 +0x166
  k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/vsphere.disksAreAttached(0xc0032a3140, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
  	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/vsphere/vsphere_utils.go
**What you expected to happen**: Tests util methods should not panic **How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**: Execute `vcp-performance` test suite which can be found here - `test/e2e/storage/vsphere/vsphere_volume_perf.go` **Anything else we need to know?**: The vsphere util method - `disksAreAttached` is used by multiple test suites (Scale tests, performance tests) **Environment**: - Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"19+", GitVersion:"v1.19.0-alpha.3.1808+59b0f9d9a8db40-dirty", GitCommit:"59b0f9d9a8db407fe4c7f8f906418ed6c4e6a928", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2020-07-04T03:10:03Z", GoVersion:"go1.14.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"19+", GitVersion:"v1.19.0-alpha.3.1808+59b0f9d9a8db40", GitCommit:"59b0f9d9a8db407fe4c7f8f906418ed6c4e6a928", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2020-07-02T20:49:42Z", GoVersion:"go1.14.4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: vSphere Cloud Provider

labels.name: kind/bug

title: vsphere cloud provider e2e util function panics
